client.guis.description: Allows guis and overlays to be defined in resourcepacks

client.item_display.description: Displaying shields on your back or swords on your hip

server.commands.description: Allows commands to be defined in datapacks

server.data.description: Allows arbitrary data structures to be constructed easily

server.permissions.description: Allows player permissions to be configured
